name: Candyland Casino
description: There will be trivia, spin the bottle - truth or trivia, bingo, hat game, and normal gambling with slots, cards, and roulette!

name: Games Night
description: Come to The Three Broomsticks to play Trivia Race and, back by popular demand, Bingo! The winners will get $1 million each!

description: With Paint Poker. And some great prizes to give away. With more fun stuff coming up like the original coding war. And more. I just finished the huge maze. name: Christmas Trivia and Skill
description: As we skill, Santa (Papai Noel) will be asking Christmas trivia questions.
